Name: Valence Security
Author: Valence Security - info@valencesecurity.com
Description: [Valence Security](https://valencesecurity.com/) SaaS security platform: Find and Fix your SaaS risks with the only SaaS security platform that brings together security teams and business users to effectively manage SaaS security posture and remediate risks.
WorkbookBladeDescription: This Solution installs a workbook for Valence Security SaaS security platform. You can use this workbook to view and analyze alerts raised by Valence. The following workbook elements are included: 1. Alerts count by severity, over the past 30 days, 2. Alerts count by day over the past week.
